kgurushankar.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • kgurushankar.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
    Regular polygon is a polygon which has congruent angles and sides
    Author:
    kgurushankar

    • Constructor Summary

                      int numSides,

        Constructs a new regular Polygon with numSides sides, side length sideLength, at x, y
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the center of this regular polygon
        y - y coordinate of the center of this regular polygon
        numSides - number of sides of this regular polygon
        sideLength - length of each side of this regular polygon
